description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Fart Machine II: Revenge of the Fart is finally here! Due to overwhelming popular demand, The Fart Machine has returned to the Xbox, now with bigger and better farts than ever. This release includes ALL of the top-quality farts of the previous game, as well as some new classics! These high-definition farts are so gassy that you can almost smell them! Are you ready to unleash your inner fart?
description.short: The Fart Machine II: Revenge of the Fart is finally here! Due to overwhelming popular demand, The Fart Machine has returned to the Xbox, now with bigger and better farts than ever. This release includes ALL of the top-quality farts of the previous game, as well as some new classics! These high-definition farts are so gassy that you can almost smell them! Are you ready to unleash your inner fart?
